thread.title: Delphine Roche-Gordon

author: Delphine Roche-Gordon
title: Delphine Roche-Gordon
text:
Fast service, lovely packaging and tasty food (or so my dog says!) made up for each individual dog, plus an online question and answer service - all of the above make me feel very reassured that my dog is getting the best diet for her age, weight and breed. Her coat shines and she's the picture of health since I started her on the Tails.com food.
Thank you for being a brilliant team and supplier.
